title: Looking for people to join a Fantasy LCS Draft
body:
Hey guys, anyone interested in making a fantasy lcs team plz join
dedication preferred but not fussed if u just pick and never check back on it
 add me IGN: Axolotl so we can start drafting, cheers
http://fantasy.lolesports.com/share/join/league/1106435/10Kfi4YMdtaOi9yHodtP

replies.body: It'd help if you gave us the link for the league
